item.title: Korasi Specbar Disappearing
item.dc:creator: @sume sume
item.description:
@sume wrote:

My korasi specbar disappears sometimes when i wear it, and when i click the specbar, the text in specbar is always light, not dark. Could anyone tell me how to fix it here’s code in CombatAssistant.Java

[code]/* case 19780:
c.gfx100(1224);
c.startAnimation(1872);
c.specAccuracy = 7.99;
c.specDamage = 1.40;
c.ssSpec = true;
c.hitDelay = getHitDelay(c.getItems().getItemName(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]).toLowerCase());
break;*/

			case 19780:
   c.gfx0(1224); c.startAnimation(1872); if
  (c.playerIndex > 0) { Client opp = (Client)
  Server.playerHandler.players[c.playerIndex]; if(opp != null)
  opp.gfx0(1224); } else if (c.npcIndex > 0) { NPC opp =
  Server.npcHandler.npcs[c.npcIndex]; if(opp != null) opp.gfx0(1224); }
  c.specAccuracy = 5.00; c.specDamage = 2.00; c.ssSpec = true;
  c.hitDelay = getHitDelay(c.getItems()
  .getItemName(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]) .toLowerCase());
  break;[/code]

And here in ItemAssistant.Java

case 19780:// Korasi's Sword case 19784: c.getPA().sendFrame171(0, 7674); specialAmount(weapon, c.specAmount, 7686); break;

Read full topic
